name: Azorum Overdrive
description:
An OUYA ANNIVERSARY JAM 2020 entry.

AZORUM OVERDRIVE is a fast paced arcade rail shooter with a nod to old superscaler 3D shooting and racing games. Try to get through Azorum, the ancient city full of traps and dangers. Shoot gates and adapt your polarity to force fields.

And.. TRY AGAIN!

Use (O) to shoot, (U) to change polarity.

Not quite as polished or complete as I hoped it would be after 10 days but I think it is playable. Made with Godot Engine. (2.1.4 - newer doesn't deploy to OUYA)
